text: 17.14 Jer 50.44-45, 1 Ti 6.15, Lep 16.14, 19.19 Gapman bɨnonɨm anɨb okok, Chag Sipsip Ñɨluk ak ayɨp penpen gɨnɨgabal. Penpen gɨnɨgabal ak pen, ne ke bɨnonɨm okok mɨdupsek bɨnonɨm awl yɨbɨl kɨli mɨdeb ak, ne ke bɨawl okok mɨdupsek bɨawl yɨbɨl kɨli mɨdeb ak, nop ñag paklɨnɨgel tek ma lɨnɨgab agak. Binɨb ne ke nɨŋɨd suk agɨl kɨlop aglup okok, nop chɨgɨl nep yenɨgabal agak. Binɨb ne jɨmñɨl mɨdebal anɨb okok, kɨli bɨnonɨm yokɨp anɨb okok kɨlop ñag ju yokɨnɨgabal agak.
